title: engE engEyaDi annamE innamudu
sahitya:
engE engEyaDi annamE innamudu marakatat-tirumEni iLavarasu nanda rAjagOpAlan


caraNam    mangAp-pugazhuDaiya brndAvanattALan shenkOl piDitta tirukkaiyan anda 
shenkOlaiyum kuzhalAi sangItam pADa vaittu nangaiyar manam kavarnda kalvan
shenkOlaiyum kuzhalAi pUngAnu pUngamena sangItam pADa vaitta kaiyan iLa
mangaiyar manam kavarnda meyyan tiruDi illai enru kai virikkum poyyan nejat-
tirundu naTanamADum ayyan (tisram) iLam kamalam virindenna taLam kuLirum kaNNaiyyan
